text:
Company Background:
Brown-Cohen is a leading industrial safety solutions provider, known for our commitment to excellence and our focus on creating a safe and inclusive workplace. We specialize in delivering high-quality safety training and equipment solutions to a diverse range of industries.

Job Type:
Full-time

Job Description:
We are seeking a Safety & Equipment Training Specialist to join our team. This role involves developing and delivering comprehensive training programs on safety practices and the use of equipment. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in safety protocols and a passion for educating others.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and implement safety training programs.
- Conduct training sessions on the proper use of safety equipment.
- Evaluate training effectiveness and update programs as necessary.
- Ensure compliance with industry safety standards and regulations.
- Collaborate with team members to maintain a safe and inclusive work environment.

Qualifications and Experience Needed:
- Bachelor’s degree in Occupational Health and Safety or a related field.
- At least 3 years of experience in safety training.
- Strong communication and presentation skills.
- Ability to work collaboratively with a diverse team.
- Certification in safety training is a plus.

Perks and Benefits:
- Health, dental, and vision insurance.
- Paid time off and holidays.
- Retirement savings plan with company match.
- Opportunities for professional development and career advancement.
- We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. The salary for this position ranges from $50,000 to $70,000, based on your experience and skills.

Our Commitment to Inclusivity:
At Brown-Cohen, we believe in creating a workplace that respects and values diversity. We are committed to maintaining an environment free from discrimination and harassment. We welcome applications from individuals of all backgrounds and identities, including LGBTQIA community members.
